chapter.title: Pandora Servers
chapter.para: In Pandora 1.2 there are different type of servers, Network Server, Data Server or SNMP Server.
Is posible manage the Pandora Servers in "Manage Servers" option of the Administration menu.
The following fields are displayed in the Managed Servers page:

listitem.para: Status: Status of the server. Green ok and Red fail.
IP address: IP of the Server.
Master: Mark when the server is Master and not mark when the master is backup.
Started at: Date when the Server started.
Updated at: The date of the last update.
Action: Icons to modify a server´s properties or to delete a server.

chapter.para: Is posible delete a with the icon
Is posible change the server´s propirties with the icon
In a Server is posiible modify: Name, IP Address and Description.
